quote: You should use your strength to help others.
I'll take on your share of suffering
Smart people usually don't brag about being smart
Just help them, Just do it, That way when you die, you won't die alone.
When granted everything, you can't do anything.
Love is the most twisted curse of all.
Dying to win and risking death to win are completely different.
I won't regret the way I lived.
Education is making people realize things.
